channel.title: Entertainment
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Entertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Prince William Wants His Children to Grow Up Surrounded by Nature and Opportunity, But Warns the 'Future Is at Risk'
item.description: The Prince of Wales shares three children — Prince George, 12, Princess Charlotte, 10, and Prince Louis, 7 — with his wife, Kate Middleton
